ValidationRule.description: If a Term deal's Rate Lock Type = Early Rate Lock, then the Rate Lock Expiration Date must be filled in.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Record_Type_Name__c = "Term_Loan", ISCHANGED(Rate_Lock_Picklist__c), ISPICKVAL(Rate_Lock_Picklist__c, "Early Rate Locked"), ISBLANK( Rate_Lock_Expiration_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide a value for the Rate Lock Expiration Date since the deal has been Early Rate Locked.
